de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISEmail

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl, ISCommon, ISConnect
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISAnswer, ISEmaillist, ISQuestion

    public interface ISEmail
extends ISCommon
    The base interface for the email objects.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server.ISCommon
